sentences.en: Agricultural interests are some of the most powerful lobbies in Washington.
sentences.cn: 农业利益集团是华盛顿最具影响力的游说团体之一。

sentences.en: Agricultural subsidies absorb about half the EU's income.
sentences.cn: 农业补贴占去了欧盟收入的大约一半.

sentences.en: As a landowner, he was actively interested in agricultural improvements.
sentences.cn: 作为土地所有者, 他对于农业方面的改良怀有浓厚的兴趣.

sentences.en: As agriculture developed, agricultural ideas diffused across Europe.
sentences.cn: 随着农业的发展，农业知识开始在欧洲普及。

sentences.en: Chemical products were used liberally over agricultural land.
sentences.cn: 化学产品曾被大量地用于农田。

sentences.en: Farmers struggling for survival strip the forests for agricultural land.
sentences.cn: 为生存而挣扎的农民们把森林伐光来作农业用地。

sentences.en: France once was an agricultural country.
Good agricultural land is in short supply.
He was trained for gardening at the Agricultural College.
Modernization is the key to speed up our agricultural development.
sentences.cn: 现代化是加快农业发展的关键.

sentences.en: North Carolina is classed as an agricultural state.
sentences.cn: 北卡罗来纳州是农业州.

sentences.en: On the customs declaration, the sender labeled the freight as agricultural machinery.
sentences.cn: 在报关单上，寄货人将货物列为农用机械。

sentences.en: Shandong province is famous for its abundant agricultural resources.
sentences.cn: 山东省以其丰富的农业资源而闻名遐迩.

sentences.en: The drought has severely disrupted agricultural production.
sentences.cn: 旱灾已严重影响了农业生产。
他们正在发放农业信用贷款.
我们还发放了农业贷款.

words.tran_cn: 农业家；[农] 农场工作者

phrases.tran_cn: 农业机械（agricultural machine的复数形式）

trans.tran_cn: 农业的，农用的，以农业为主的
trans.tran_en: Agricultural means involving or relating to agriculture
